about_the_game:
Game Features

  • Forging Rings
  • Enchantment system based on Nutrition
  • A Not-so-serious Serious Game
  • Quirky Sound Effects

Create high-quality rings!

"Master, we want to be smarter," "No problem!" (add some salmon)
"Master, I want to be stronger," "No problem" (pour in some milk)
"Master, I want to improve resistance," "No problem" (add some chili)
"Master, why does the sound of forging rings sound like cooking?" "Oh, that's the new technique!"

name: Ring Craft

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 /11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 /11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 and higher
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In "Ring Craft," you will play as a ring forging master, using various materials to add useful or useless attributes to the rings. You will explore the secrets of nutrition, oop, I mean, enchantment. Whether it's miracles-craft or disaster-craft, it's all up to you!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
